actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act by including independent owner-operator truckers as an exempted class under section 203(d) of that act.

summary.text: Includes independent owner-operator truckers as an exempted class to the motor carriers provision under the Interstate Commerce Act. Provides that no such driver shall charge or collect a rate, fare, or charge lower than the lowest rate, fare, or charge specified in tariffs or schedules filed and in effect pursuant to such Act for the same commodities between identical points served. Provides that if no such tariff or schedule is on file, the lowest rate for like commodities between identical or similar points shall determine the lowest rate, fare, or charge.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act by including independent owner-operator truckers as an exempted class under section 203(d) of that act.
